text.text_translated:
Do you dream of climbing Mount Everest? Or walking to the South Pole? You are not alone. Every year, thousands of people try this. They climb the highest mountains in the world. Or they walk across continents.

Old explorers used maps and a compass. But today, adventurers use modern technology. They use GPS. They use satellite phones.

Many adventurers love nature. They travel to help people understand problems with nature. Other adventurers very much want to help people who need help. They collect money for charities.
